com.buschmais.xo.api

Interface XOTransaction.Synchronization

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheSynchronization, TransactionalResultIterator
    Enclosing interface:
    XOTransaction

    public static interface XOTransaction.Synchronization
    Defines a transaction lifecycle callback which can be registered.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterCompletion(boolean committed)
      Called after the transaction has been completed.
      void beforeCompletion()
      Called before the transaction is completed.

    • Method Detail

      • beforeCompletion

        void beforeCompletion()
        Called before the transaction is completed.

      • afterCompletion

        void afterCompletion(boolean committed)
        Called after the transaction has been completed.
        Parameters:
        committed - true if the transaction as been committed, false if the transaction was rolled back.
